--Create database GuimchaDB
--GO

use GuimchaDB
GO

create view IoTSummary as 
select a.deviceid 
        , b.devicetype 
        , cast(b.location as varchar(128)) as location
        , cast(b.latitude as float) as latitude
        , cast(b.longitude as float) as  longitude
        , a.measuretype 
        , a.unitSymbol 
        , cast(sum(measureValue) as float) as measureValueSum 
        , count(*) as count 
from OPENROWSET(
    PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
    CONNECTION = 'Account=playgroundeu2;Database=Volcano;',
    OBJECT = 'IoTSignals',
    SERVER_CREDENTIAL  = 'MyCosmosDbAccountCredential'
    ) as a 
left join OPENROWSET(
        PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
        CONNECTION = 'Account=playgroundeu2;Database=Volcano;',
        OBJECT = 'IoTDeviceInfo',
        SERVER_CREDENTIAL  = 'MyCosmosDbAccountCredential'
        ) as b 
on a.deviceid = b.deviceid 
where a.unitSymbol = 'RPM' 
group by a.deviceid, b.devicetype, b.location, b.latitude, b.longitude, a.measuretype, a.unitSymbol
